cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 19th Oct 2025 (ACDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 19th Oct 2025 (ACDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 1 bed for 1 night in a 6-bed mixed dorm, linen included.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard 5 Bed Male Dorm
dorms.description: Male dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards. They offer male accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 1 bed in a 5-bed dorm, linen included, 2 bunk beds 1 single bed.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 1 Bed in a 4 bed shared room with bathroom, TV, basic kitchenette, linen supplied

privates.name: Deluxe Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: 1 night in a private room, queen size bed and with own bathroom
